snippet: The Robert Adams show at Matthew Marks attests to the almost classical lucidity of Mr. Adams’s work and the passion for nature that fuels it.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews works by American photographer Robert Adams at Matthew Marks Gallery.
lead_paragraph: The Robert Adams show at Matthew Marks attests to the almost classical lucidity of Mr. Adams’s work and the passion for nature that fuels it.

headline.main: Robert Adams at Matthew Marks Gallery
